thread.section_title: COMO The Halkin - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Doesnt get much better than this
thread.title_full: Doesnt get much better than this - Review of COMO The Halkin, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: CountrytoCountry616
title: Doesnt get much better than this
text:
Ive stayed at Como hotels before and they are consistently of excellent quality.
Its actually my favourite hotel company to stay with.
The Halken is no exception to the 5 star experience I have had with all of their hotels I have stayed at.
Exceptional attention to detail and they really make you feel welcome. True 5 star service.
If you want to know what a 5 star hotel is like then stay at the Halken.
The concierge were particularly excellent during our stay.
